feat: initialize Angular 21 Hitchhiker''s Guide quote app

Set up a standalone Angular 21 application with Tailwind CSS v4 that
displays random quotes from The Hitchhiker''s Guide to the Galaxy.

- Build QuoteCard component using Angular Signals \(signal/computed\)

- Dark-themed UI with slate/emerald color palette
- Add CLAUDE.md with project commands and architecture notes

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
